definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Cartrider bicycle created by Korean designer Jaebeom Jeong.
sentences.chinese: 韓國設計師設計的由超市購物車改裝成的自行車。

sentences.english: Take my word for it that driving sheep is like pushing a loaded supermarket trolley.
sentences.chinese: 我可以保證，趕羊就像推一輛滿載的超市購物車。

sentences.english: For example, do you have any sort of shopping cart or shopping bag?
sentences.chinese: 例如，您有任何類型的購物車或購物袋嗎？

sentences.english: It contains the online candy catalog and the contents of the shopper’s virtual shopping cart.
sentences.chinese: 它包含在線糖果目錄和購物者的虛擬購物車中的東西。

sentences.english: Once the verifications are done, you need to remove the item from your cart.
sentences.chinese: 一旦檢驗完成，你需要把貨物從你的購物車中移走。

sentences.english: I came to my senses and turned my cart around just in time.
sentences.chinese: 我恢復了理智，然後及時地將我的購物車轉了個彎。

sentences.english: Traditionally shopping carts are placed on the right-hand side at the top of the page.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的說，購物車都放在頁面頂端的右側。

sentences.english: He is then redirected to a shopping cart containing the game.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他被重定向到包含這個遊戲的購物車。

sentences.english: My company uses cs-cart shopping cart system which is open source.
sentences.chinese: 我的公司使用銫車購物車系統是開源的。

sentences.english: More are paying closer attention to the food they put in their supermarket trolleys.
sentences.chinese: 越多人更加關注他們放進購物車裏的食品。

sentences.english: For example, an interface to retrieve article data does not need to know about shopping carts.
sentences.chinese: 例如，用來檢索商品資料的接口不需要了解購物車。

sentences.english: At a regional supermarket, two women move half-filled mart carts.
sentences.chinese: 在一間本地的超市裏，兩位女士推着半滿的購物車。

sentences.english: Mal's e-commerce is a FREE Shopping Cart Service.
sentences.chinese: 仲裁法的電子商務是一個免費的購物車服務。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the key developing progress of an on-line shopping car.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要介紹了一個在線購物車系統的開發過程。

sentences.english: They add the items to be purchased to the online shopping cart.
sentences.chinese: 他們將要購買的產品添加到在線購物車中。

sentences.english: With this change, your modifications to the shopping cart are complete.
sentences.chinese: 完成了這個改變，您就完成了對購物車的修改。

definition: to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結賬|结账
the only son of a family/(functional programming or philosophy) monad
sales counter/front desk/bar/(of markets, medicines etc) OTC (over-the-counter)
easily/without trouble/while one is at it/in passing/handy
to be a real headache/to find sth a real headache/to beat one's brains
to act with confusion/to be in a flurry/to be flustered
